item.title: Why I Still Use RSS to Stay Informed
item.description: In the age of social media algorithms, personalised feeds, and endless scrolling, it might seem odd to rely on an older technology like RSS to stay informed. But for me, RSS remains one of the best ways to stay on top of my interests without the noise and distractions of modern platforms. Here’s why I still use RSS after all these years, how it helps me cut through the clutter, and why I prefer it over social media algorithms.
